Recommendations: 1. The college may give much priority in inviting representative from the industrial linkage as one of the members in revising the curriculum.
2. Faculty members may develop instructional materials considering the CHED OBE format syllabi of instruction.
3. Faculty members may encourage to construct examination based on the TOS.
4. In conducting research on the tracer study, feedbacks from employers regarding the graduates may be considered to evaluate if the performance of the graduate are commendable.
